The early-onset form is much less common than the late-onset form, accounting for less than 5 percent of all cases of Alzheimer disease.",GHR,Alzheimer disease
How many people are affected by Alzheimer disease ?,"Alzheimer disease currently affects an estimated 2.4 million to 4.5 million Americans. Because the risk of developing Alzheimer disease increase
